body.name: SUPPLY - Ultra Lather Shaving Cream - Sandalwood & Cedar - Lathering, Men's Shaving Lather Cream - Hypoallergenic, Naturally Soothing Shave Lather, Protects Against Razor Burn, Irritation- 3.4 Oz Jar
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 31 mins
features: PLANT-BASED MEN’S SHAVING CREAM: Our blend of natural ingredients make this perfect for sensitive skin. We combined Aloe-Vera, Jojoba Oil, and Shea Butter to moisturize your skin as you shave. Proudly free of parabens, phthalates, and other harmful chemicals to deliver a smooth shave without causing irritation, early aging or breakouts.

WHY SUPPLY: We design and develop every product from scratch with an obsessive dedication to quality, durability, and functionality. The result? Nothing but the best men’s shaving and skincare products on the market that we're proud to put our names on.
SANDALWOOD AND CEDAR: Natural scent that will complement and enhance the smell of your cologne, deodorant or aftershave.

RICH, THICK LATHER: Our custom formula is designed to easily create a thick lather, ensuring a smooth, irritation-free shave. It provides the protective cushion between your skin and the blade. So, your razor only cuts hair and never your skin.

SUPPLY SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Love it or send it back. We offer a 100-day money-back guarantee on every jar of Ultra Lather Shaving Cream. And you can take it anywhere because every jar is 3.4oz. Pack it in your carry-on without breaking TSA regulations.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #18,505 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #50 in Men's Shaving Creams

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Having been an Art of Shaving cream fan for many years, I decided to try Supply Shaving cream. This cream lathers great and really elevates the shave experience. Use the pre-shave oil for best results. Scent is nice but not overdone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supply is Great!!
reviews.reviewText: I love all things Supply. I am a woman so I user their products primarily on my legs. I have super sensitive sin and really fine body hair so it can be tough to get a decent shave. I have both the SE and Pro razors (prefer the Pro), and have tried the shave cream and post-shave, and use a shave brush from them as well to lather up the cream. All their products are really great. Everything is super high quality. If you're used to shaving cream squirting out of a pressurized can, there's a little bit of a learning curve with this "old school" kind of shaving, but it's really worth the effort. My legs are silky smooth with absolutely no irritation. I highly, HIGHLY recommend every one of their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is WAAAYYY better shaving cream than other garbage
reviews.reviewText: This is WAAAYYY better shaving cream than other available chemical garbage. I had a gilette shaving cream for my little 'baby's first shaving set', complete with disposable razors, and boy did my skin not like it. And that was before I started shaving! Of course, I might have a really skewed perspective, but I can swear this supply shaving cream makes it LEAGUES better.I might not have years of experience with shaving, but before I started using Gilette Skinguard, I was using a supply razor for quite some time, so I can say with some confidence that it was the shaving cream that made my first experiences with wet shaves that slightest bit worse.When I use this, even if I've somehow cutting myself left and right, it doesn't cause that unpleasant tingling sensation that cheap shaving cream causes. Again, I do have a little experience now, but just remember:I'm BIASED as FRICK for this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supply products = decadence
reviews.reviewText: Supply shave products are my favorite thing about my daily self care routine. I’m not a fan of the single blade shaver. Mach 3 works best for me, BUT, absolutely EVERY ONE of their other products are FANTASTIC! Aromas are heavenly. I love the shave cream brush and marble accessories. Whipping up some shave foam is a delight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: I just received my "tin" of shaving cream this week and tried it last night. Upon opening the tin, there is a very pleasant, unique, masculine scent that I like very much. It was not overpowering at all. I could see some air pockets inside the container, but it looks like a full tin of product. I did not use a brush to apply, only a small amount that covers the index finger up to the first crease line. It lathered effectively enough to give me a decent layer on my face/neck. If you use a brush, you might only need half of the amount I used on your brush. It is hard to say how long this should last me as I only shave every 2+ days or so, but it feels like I will definitely get my money's worth before needing a new tin. So far, I am glad I gave Supply a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just got back to using a real razor.
reviews.reviewText: As a 13-year-old kid, my grandfather gave me his straight razor. It was second generation. I lost it in college along with his strop. Someone borrowed it. For the last 56 years, I have been using whatever is at Walmart. I bought a German Straight Razer and it feels great. I bought a brush and started using this saving cream and just made shaving fun again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have utilized many shave creams but this is far and above the best. Great scent too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but expensive
reviews.reviewText: The product is terrific; the only thing stopping it from being 5 star is the price for the size is rather high.
